channel.title: Help with commands
channel.description:
Some commands only owner can do, is it possible to make that admin can do them too ?
and also can someone post the ::hail commands code
thanks in advance

item.title: Help with commands
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

hey try type like this (COMMANDNAME) if playername = (xronniex,chris)
or just do the command twice copy the command and paste it under and change the name to xronniex

Read full topic

item.title: Help with commands
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

[quote=“xronniex, post:7, topic:303257”][quote author=PushedPrawn link=topic=399499.msg2963311#msg2963311 date=1253395134]
Oh… It’s a 508? Shoulda said that… i don’t know much about 508’s. I’d guess change the <2 to <1 if you want only mods and up to be able to do it… but if you want anyone to be able to it’s <0
[/quote]

yes it should some something around the area of && = playername chris or something, copy and paste that with ur name beside it with like the ll symbol

The only one who can use them is Chris

is it possible to make 2 users use that command ? Chris & xronniex[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with commands
item.dc:creator: @xronniex xronniex
item.description:
@xronniex wrote:

[quote=“PushedPrawn, post:8, topic:303257”][quote author=xronniex link=topic=399499.msg2963313#msg2963313 date=1253395370]

Oh… It’s a 508? Shoulda said that… i don’t know much about 508’s. I’d guess change the <2 to <1 if you want only mods and up to be able to do it… but if you want anyone to be able to it’s <0

Alright thanks for your help. i appreciate it

The only one who can use them is Chris

is it possible to make 2 users use that command ? Chris & xronniex
[/quote]

Yeah, but idunno how:\ If Chris is just the one you got the source from then change chris to xronniex but if not… I don’t know D:[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with commands
item.dc:creator: @xronniex xronniex
item.description:
@xronniex wrote:

[quote=“PushedPrawn, post:4, topic:303257”][quote author=xronniex link=topic=399499.msg2963298#msg2963298 date=1253393853]

change the rights lol and
rip it from a source that has it

how which file i need to edit
[/quote]

Edit client.java. Change the <3 or whatever it is to <2 when you find it.

To find it you will need to search the command without “::” (CTRL+F)[/quote][quote=“PushedPrawn, post:4, topic:303257”][quote author=xronniex link=topic=399499.msg2963298#msg2963298 date=1253393853]

change the rights lol and
rip it from a source that has it

how which file i need to edit
[/quote]

Edit client.java. Change the <3 or whatever it is to <2 when you find it.

To find it you will need to search the command without “::” (CTRL+F)[/quote]You mean commands.java right ?

and theres no <3 only <2 because its 508

Read full topic

item.title: Help with commands
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“xronniex, post:3, topic:303257”][quote author=project fallout link=topic=399499.msg2963295#msg2963295 date=1253393748]
change the rights lol and
rip it from a source that has it
[/quote]

how which file i need to edit[/quote]

Edit client.java. Change the <3 or whatever it is to <2 when you find it.

To find it you will need to search the command without “::” (CTRL+F)

Read full topic
